page.title: 17LEISURE IN WILLOUGHBY
page.content: We found out that the most popular activities for{adults}are {reading, watching T.V and gardening. The next most popular activity was do- it- yourself, then spectator sports and active sports. The least popular was bingo. Most people do these things for enjoyment and relaxation. Quite a few people do them for satisfaction and pleasure. Only a few people participate for necessity, education or fitness. Most{children}spend their leisure time{watching T.V. or reading.}Quite a few children participate in active sports such as football, tennis, riding, swimming, and some do gardening, Only one or two children do spectator sports and do-it-yourself.
